snippet: Mobileye, a provider of driver-assistance technology systems, said on Sunday that it had raised $400 million in financing, valuing the company at about $1.5 billion.
abstract: Mobileye, a provider of driver-assistance technology systems, said on Sunday that it had raised $400 million in financing, valuing the company at about $1.5 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Mobileye, a Maker of Automated Driving Systems, Raises $400 Million
